full_title: Dance The Night by Dua Lipa
title: Dance The Night

description.plain:
“Dance The Night” is an upbeat disco dance track by Dua Lipa. The song served as the lead single for Greta Gerwig’s Barbie soundtrack and was released on May 26, 2023 ahead of the film’s release in July. Dua Lipa made her debut acting performance in the film as Mermaid Barbie.

The song was used for a scene in the movie during Barbie’s blowout party in which all the Barbies and Kens break into choreographed dance.

embed_content: Read “Dance The Night” by Dua Lipa on Genius

body.plain:
“Dance The Night” is an upbeat disco dance track by Dua Lipa. The song served as the lead single for Greta Gerwig’s Barbie soundtrack and was released on May 26, 2023 ahead of the film’s release in July. Dua Lipa made her debut acting performance in the film as Mermaid Barbie.

The song was used for a scene in the movie during Barbie’s blowout party in which all the Barbies and Kens break into choreographed dance.

Diamonds under my eyes

That's the moment I shine

'Cause every romance shakes and it bends
